data.title: Michael Caine
data.meta_description: Michael Caine advises on matters involving technology-based transactions for a broad range of clients in a variety of industries. Michael has experience
data.text:
Michael Caine advises on matters involving technology-based transactions for a broad range of clients in a variety of industries. Michael has experience drafting and negotiating license agreements, joint development agreements, SaaS Agreements, and other technology-related agreements.

Prior to joining Perkins Coie, Michael served as in-house counsel for an international semiconductor company. While there, Michael advised on general corporate matters and negotiated various commercial agreements, including supply agreements, distribution agreements, and master service agreements. Michaelâ€™s prior in-house experience enables him to effectively guide clients through a broad range of complex commercial transactions to ensure they achieve their business objectives.
